room_title: Escape room "Zodiac Killer: Legacy" by The Exit Game in San Antonio
review: Had a great time. The game Zodiac Killer was well thought out and very challenging. There is a definite sense of accomplishment in getting through the clues and puzzles. I will definitely return.

room_title: Escape room "Zodiac Killer: Legacy" by The Exit Game in San Antonio
review: This was my first time going and had a blast! We did the Zodiac killer room. Wayyy cool even if we didn't escape. lol Definitely will be going back.

room_title: Escape room "Zodiac Killer: Legacy" by The Exit Game in San Antonio
review: Did the Zodiac room. Challenging but not so hard that it leads to frustration. Made it out with 8 minutes to spare. Clues were helpful but not so easy that it gave away the problem. Had clues to spare. Will be back.
